extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the sand and surf alike while you get your Bingo fix!  Now available for Android Smartphones & Tablets!ENJOY BINGO ON THE BEACHBingo Beach combines classic bingo action with exciting fast paced power-ups, collectibles, unique new items, leveling up, chat, and a lot more to create a true sunny delight!REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYERConnect from anywhere and play against other Bingo Beach goers.  Chat in real time with other players in between rounds or while you daub your cards.  Play 4 cards at a time on tablet or up to 2 cards on your phone.UNIQUE GAME CHANGING ITEMSUse new and unique items like the Daub Spotter and Bingo Spotter to make bingo even more fast paced and fun.Once you've used a Daub Spotter you will never go back!EXPLORE THE BEACHES & WATERS OF THE WORLDCollect collectibles, trophies, and custom daubs from around the world.Play Bingo Beach for FREE and begin your your journey with Lucky Cat today!Like us on: Facebook.com/EmberEntertainmentFollow us on: twitter.com/Ember_DevIf you have problems or suggests we would love to hear from you.  You can reach us at: contact@ember-entertainment.com

reviews.title: ,Fun and mor fun
reviews.comment: Love this game. So easy and is a great way to pass time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love bingo and love cats plus the beach makes one great game. It\'s very relaxing.
reviews.author: Heather Cook

reviews.comment: My favorite game to play! Cats make it cute and its just the right pace.\tJust the right pace, cats and collectibles make it really cute! My favorite game to play!
reviews.author: Jill Eutzy

reviews.title: so fun it best bingo I think :) :)
reviews.comment: greatest bingo ever it so fun I love chat to
reviews.author: Damien Camelbeek

reviews.title: Fun Game Wht Happened.
reviews.comment: I play Bingo daily & have just started playing this version. So far so good. UPDATE... I HAVE BEEN BOOTED 2X IN LAST 20 MINUTES.. I WAS NOT GIVEN MY CREDITS BACK OR POWER-UPS THAT I USED, WHY? ? THERE IS NO WAY TO CONTACT SUPPORT ON THE GAME SCREEN.
reviews.author: A Mac

reviews.title: fun game
reviews.comment: Fun game to play just it cost for the power ups and the keys. It gives u a chance to get the gems for what u need,but they don\'t pay that much. Over all it a fun game to keep u busy.
reviews.author: Patricia Nedweski

reviews.title: Fun while I\'m losing weight! :D
reviews.comment: I play this everyday... While I\'m losing weight.. I drink my Xyngular Lean Shake and I\'m losing 8 to 15 pounds in just 8 days! There\'s nothing easier than this! Want more info seven_eighth 7 five nine4 seven 7two_one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: absolutely great layout. i love that i can.play 4 cards and not get frustrated with all the switching and maneuvering. ideal for speed bingo players like me irl. nice
reviews.author: Erin McReynolds

reviews.title: beach bingo
reviews.comment: Game is fun but need more powerups. I downloaded beach bingo a couple days ago & i really havent stopped playing it since
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great game. Easy and a great way to pass time
reviews.comment: great game. Easy and a great way to pass time
reviews.author: Latricia Jones

reviews.title: Fun..fun..fun..
reviews.comment: This game is fun to play. Easy to loose time
reviews.author: Christine Geck

reviews.comment: I would give a 5 star rating but it wont let me connect with fb and shuts off when i try it. Its still fun as the guest tho!
reviews.author: annie denson

reviews.title: not bad!
reviews.comment: norm setup, same general game/tournament styling, &unfortunately also with the all-too common running strip of balls called that CANNOT be viewed as a total callers card of all#s...besides that personal lil pet-peeve tho, a good,fun game all-around!
reviews.author: Shannon R

reviews.title: A good game
reviews.comment: I like that you see all your cards on one screen. It makes it a lot easier to daub cells. A fun bingo game to add to your bingo collection
reviews.author: Ashley Delaney

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this game. Easy to play and very entertaining
reviews.author: Tammy Knoska

reviews.title: Better since the update!
reviews.comment: Good game but if u leave the screen too long u lose ur cards and chips. Annoying!
reviews.author: Elise Clooney

reviews.title: LOVE BINGO
reviews.comment: This game is great. I would play more often but you have to wait so long to get chips unless you buy them and when they say free I expect FREE. Other than that I love it.
reviews.author: Candy Niles

reviews.title: Bingo Beach
reviews.comment: Game is very frustrating...too many times I have waited on 1 number to win.. and other tim es I hardly have any numbers called.
reviews.author: David Amos

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: This has become my favorite game! Once you get the hang of it I think it\'s one of the best games available! I wish there was some way to play it off line, otherwise terrific!
reviews.author: e. marie robinson

reviews.title: Lvl 29 still wrkn on dolph
reviews.comment: Game is getting worse. Besides non Facebook players winning the first 3 wins, The first 4 numers are called on my card but not until after the first three non facebook members win. Before they do win the 3, I have needed at least 4 different #s and not even 1 would be called during the past 50 games I had played while checking this out.
reviews.author: Kevin Davison
